title: Habitat
creator_credit: United Nations Films and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Human habitat is any place where humans live. In the past most habitats were rural and posed relatively simple problems. At the moment, the human race is posing entirely new, and often complex problems. This film describes some of these problems and suggests some solutions
